english.segment1: Can't you see which way you're walking now. Opposite to hell is the place I wanna dwell in. Blind you cannot see it's in front of your face. It's a change to get to a better place
english.segment2: Jesus loves you someone said to you. Jesus sees you what you're up to. Jesus saves you if you wanna take. Him to live in your heart take him
english.segment3: Shaking - your head is shaking. Breaking - your heart is breaking. Aching - your soul is aching. Faking - this is no boardgame. No
english.segment4: Can't you see the sin you do now. Pretty soon find out no doubt. Can I call you Rita senorita. Gimme the blood of Christ a little bita
